app.title: FCM Message Sender
app.description: Send personalized push notifications through Firebase Cloud Messaging. Manage multiple projects, configure advanced messages and reach your users instantly.
app.footer: FCM Message Sender - Developer tool to test and send Firebase notifications

errors.title: Error
errors.fetchProjects: Failed to fetch projects from backend.

certificates.title: Firebase Certificates Management
certificates.tooltip: Upload your Firebase service account JSON certificates to enable sending FCM notifications.

errors.invalid: Invalid certificate: required fields are missing.

message.title: Compose Notification
message.description: Create and send a push notification to a device or topic.

tooltips.deviceToken: The FCM registration token for the target device.
tooltips.topic: The name of the topic to send the message to.
tooltips.title: The notification's title.
tooltips.icon: The URL of the icon to display.
tooltips.clickAction: The action associated with a user click on the notification.
tooltips.badge: The URL of the badge to display.
tooltips.androidSound: The sound to play when the device receives the notification.
tooltips.androidColor: The notification's icon color, expressed in #rrggbb format.
tooltips.androidTag: Identifier used to replace existing notifications in the notification drawer.
tooltips.androidChannelId: The notification's channel id (new in Android O).
tooltips.androidTicker: The text to scroll across the screen when the notification arrives.
tooltips.androidNotificationCount: The number to display in a badge on the app icon.
tooltips.androidImageUrl: The URL of an image to display in the Android notification.
tooltips.apnsSound: The sound to play when the device receives the notification.
tooltips.apnsBadge: The number to display in a badge on your app's icon.
tooltips.apnsContentAvailable: Provide this key with a value of 1 to indicate that new content is available.
tooltips.apnsMutableContent: Provide this key with a value of 1 to allow modification of the notification content in your app.
tooltips.apnsSubtitle: A secondary description for the notification.
tooltips.apnsInterruptionLevel: The interruption level of the notification.
tooltips.apnsFCMOptionsImage: The URL of an image to display in the APNs notification (via fcm_options).
tooltips.webpushRequireInteraction: Whether the notification requires user interaction.
tooltips.webpushVibrate: A vibration pattern for the device's vibration hardware to emit.
tooltips.webpushHeadersImage: The URL of an image to display in the Web Push notification (via headers).

errors.noProject: No project selected. Please select a project first.
errors.sendError: An error occurred while sending the message
